description: This module presents a pragmatic, accessible approach to music analysis. The main objective is to realize that while a work may appear complicated, there is always a simple and practical approach to it. Music analysis is therefore linked to awareness and practicality. Forming a clear link between musical awareness and music analysis will offer a more fruitful opportunity to allow music practitioners to focus on aspects such as musical coherence, structural relationships and interpretative choices. This analytical strategies can be adapted and included within instrumental and group lessons as techniques to teach phrasing, musical understanding and musical knowledge.
title: Practical Approaches to Musical Analysis
prerequisite: This module is restricted to students enrolled in the Master of Music Leadership degree programme, those pursuing the Graduate Certificate in Music Perspectives and Practices, and CET learners.
